about:
I am Sergio Barnes, a highly skilled web app developer with a strong foundation in CSS, HTML5, JavaScript, React, and Bootstrap. My educational background includes studying at IOC in Barcelona, where I acquired a comprehensive understanding of web development principles.

 I thrive in dynamic environments and am considered a digital nomad, embracing the flexibility to work from diverse locations. My commitment to staying at the forefront of technology and my ability to adapt to different cultures contribute to my innovative approach to creating seamless and visually appealing web applications. 


 With a passion for coding and a nomadic spirit, I bring a unique perspective to every project, leveraging my diverse experiences to deliver creative solutions. I am open to travel and eager to collaborate on challenging projects that allow me to push the boundaries of what's possible in the ever-evolving field of web development. If you are seeking a dedicated and adaptable web developer who combines technical expertise with a nomadic mindset, I am excited to contribute my skills to your team.
